title: Scrape / Spider / Crawl Apartment Directory Website
snippet:
I am looking to gather information about Apartment managers.
URL for the job:
http://www.aagddirectory.com/

Please see the attached documents for instructions and an example of the files required.  
Please indicate the number of days it will take to deliver the end result and your best price.
List your preferred language of scraping (Python, C#, Java, Perl, etc.); no preference on my side.

If you have any questions please ask.
